Texts.Eng: I see you got your Basilisk license. ^green;we can upgrade your ship now. If you bring me ^orange;8 upgrade modules ^green;I'll initiate the upgrade.
I see you got your Falcon license! ^green;Now we can upgrade your ship. If you bring me ^orange;6 upgrade modules ^green;I'll initiate the upgrade procedure.
The upgrade is complete... Enjoy your new home. ^green;I suspect more people will be asking you for help now that you have a bigger ship...
